name: BWorkgroupComponent
sample: <BWorkgroupComponent hintText='Your hint text' labelText='Your label text' />

infoArray.name: selectedWorkgroupId
infoArray.desc: Determines the workgroup that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: workgroupTypeList
infoArray.desc: Filter the workgroups by workgroup types.

infoArray.name: isAllOptionIncluded
infoArray.desc: If true an item will push to the first row of the parameter list. Default is value is false.

infoArray.name: allOptionDescription
infoArray.desc: If isAllOptionIncluded is true. Default value is 'Hepsi'

infoArray.name: labelText
infoArray.desc: The content of the floating label.

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: If true, the workgroup user component will be disabled. Default valuse is false

infoArray.name: visible
infoArray.desc: If true, the workgroup will be visible. Default valuse is true.

infoArray.name: onWorkgroupSelect
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the fec has been selected.
